dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the national boundary of Uganda for 2006. These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. (2012). National Boundary: Uganda, 2006. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/ks911mt6862 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
